EN: A unit that can perform well when either attacking or defending. The Swordsman is strong against ground and machine units but can quickly fall to bow units.  It is also very affordable.

A defensive range unit who is strong against ground units and good against mounted units, but it does very little damage to machine units and structures.  It kills enemies without being seen, sometimes.
A unit that can perform well when either attacking or defending. The Swordsman is strong against ground and machine units but can quickly fall to bow units.  It is also very affordable.

A defensive range unit who is strong against ground units and good against mounted units, but it does very little damage to machine units and structures.  It kills enemies without being seen, sometimes.
A  superb defensive unit who is very strong against mounted units.  The hoplite can quickly fall to bow units.

A unit that can perform well when either attacking or defending. The Swordsman is strong against ground and machine units but can quickly fall to bow units.  The unit is armored with platemail that provides additional protection against light weapons and it uses heavy weapon that is made for destroying metalic armors.

A superb offensive unit who is very strong aginst mounted units but can quickly fall to pike units.  Cavalry's high speed gives them the ability to get close to the bow units quickly despite of their high stealth.  It uses heavy weapon that is made for destroying platemail.
An all-around unit who is strong against ground and machine units but can quickly fall to bow units.  This unit is armored with platemail that provides additional protection against light weapons.

The only ranged offensive unit who is strong against ground units and good against mounted units, but it can fall quickly to swords and ballistic units.  The unit is iron plated that provides additional protection against light weapons.

A ranged offensive unit who is strong against structures and good against machines but can fall quickly to swords and ballistic units.  It uses heavy weapon that is made for destroying metalic armors.
A non-combat unit who used to carry loots.  The oxs are fed with beer; it's fat is so thick that would take enemies a long while to kill them.
